thread.title: Is it wedding bells at last for Amy Samir Ghanem and Hassan Raddad?
thread.title_full: Is it wedding bells at last for Amy Samir Ghanem and Hassan Raddad?

title: Is it wedding bells at last for Amy Samir Ghanem and Hassan Raddad?
text:
Is it wedding bells at last for Amy Samir Ghanem and Hassan Raddad? Is it wedding bells at last for Amy Samir Ghanem and Hassan Raddad? 2.5 5 
Published October 11th, 2015 - 14:03 GMT via SyndiGate.info Rate Article: Was this the dress rehearsal? Hassan and Amy with Amy's real mother, on the set of Haq Mayet. (Screen shot) Follow > Click here to add Amy Samir   Amy Samir   Amy Samir , Click here to add Amy Samir Ghanem   Amy Samir Ghanem   Amy Samir Ghanem , Click here to add CBC   CBC   CBC Click here to add Facebook   Facebook   Facebook Click here to add Hassan al-Raddad   Hassan al-Raddad   Hassan al-Raddad , Click here to add Samir Ghanem   Samir Ghanem   Samir Ghanem If the rumor mill wasn't already in overdrive, then it certainly is now! It seems that actor Samir Ghanem, father of actress Amy Samir Ghanem, has spilled the beans about his daughter and actor Hassan al-Raddad's engagement, Egypt Independent reports. After a cat-and-mouse game of denials over whether the pair were even dating, Ghanem told CBC on Wednesday that he "can feel the good intentions of both Raddad and Amy to get into a serious relationship" and hinted that they would be marrying soon . Funny girl Amy and heartthrob Hassan have fiercely guarded their privacy and have spent almost a year denying all rumours of them being together. Back in November of last year, Amy took to her Facebook account to say "Hello my friends, there is a circulating rumor that states I have gotten engaged, this is merely a rumor and please no one believe it. When I do get engaged I will invite you all to the big occasion," the star posted to her Facebook page. Three months later, Hassan was forced to issue a press release, slamming the media for always linking him to his co-stars. Well, as Amy and Hassan are co-stars on Haq Mayet, where there is smoke, there's fire huh? Apparently Amy is mortified by her dad's indiscretion, as now all those denials makes her look a bit foolish. We're still waiting for the official announcements that they promised to make on their facebook accounts, but in the meantime we wish the happy couple all the best and can't wait for the big day!
